title: Scientists detect water sloshing on Mars. There could be a lot.
content: Scientists detected liquid water deep inside Mars' crust, revealing where large amounts of the planet's water may have gone. NASA's InSight lander made the novel observations.
summary: Scientists detected liquid water deep inside Mars' crust, revealing where large amounts of the planet's water may have gone. NASA's InSight lander made the novel observations.
